info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Mesa County through 700 PM MDT... At 625 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Collbran, or 32 miles northeast of Grand Junction, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Collbran around 645 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
